title: Since 2.10.x, org.bson.types isn't present in quarkus & quarkus mongo dependency
body:
### Describe the bug

Until 2.9.2, i can use this import:
`import org.bson.types.ObjectId;`

My pom contains theses following dependencies:
```
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-mongodb-client</artifactId>
    </dependency> 
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-mongodb-panache</artifactId>
    </dependency>
```

Since Quarkus 2.10.x, this import isn't resolved.

But there is no update from the doc https://quarkus.io/guides/mongodb-panache, or in the migration guide https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-2.10
